Class Party

java.lang.Object
  Party

public class Party
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds objects of type PlayerCharacter used for loading into combat or as an object for the players to store their party

Version:
(0.1_7)
Author:
(DeusBlu)

Field Summary
static int PLAYERS
           
 
Constructor Summary
Party()
          Constructor for empty party object
Party(PlayerCharacter[] players)
          constructor for parties of pre-build arrays
 
Method Summary
 PlayerCharacter[] getPlayers()
          returns the player object at the requested index
 boolean isDefeated()
          returns true if either party is dead
 boolean isEmpty()
          checks to see if the Party is empty and returns false if not empty
 void join(PlayerCharacter player)
          adds the player to the party
 PlayerCharacter remove(int spot)
          removes a character from the party setting the pointer back to null and returns the character that was in that location
 void shortStatus()
          prints the status of the party in short form
 void status(int player)
          prints the full status of the Player Character
